mapper.select: SELECT title, writer, create_at FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE rownum<=5 ORDER BY create_at DESC

SELECT tp.prj_id, tp.name AS pname, td.dept_name, te.name, tps.prj_status, tp.start_at, tp.end_at FROM TBL_PROJECT tp, TBL_RESOURCE tr, TBL_EMP te, TBL_DEPT td, TBL_PRJ_STATUS tps WHERE tp.prj_id = tr.prj_id AND tr.emp_id = te.emp_id AND te.dept_id = td.dept_id AND tp.prj_status_id = tps.prj_status_id AND tp.pm_id = tr.emp_id AND rownum<=10 ORDER BY tp.create_at DESC

SELECT tp.prj_id, tp.name AS pname, td.dept_name, te.name, tps.prj_status, tp.start_at, tp.end_at FROM TBL_PROJECT tp, TBL_RESOURCE tr, TBL_EMP te, TBL_DEPT td, TBL_PRJ_STATUS tps WHERE tp.prj_id = tr.prj_id AND tr.emp_id = te.emp_id AND te.dept_id = td.dept_id AND tp.prj_status_id = tps.prj_status_id AND tp.pm_id = tr.emp_id AND tp.PRJ_ID IN (SELECT tr.prj_id FROM tbl_emp te, tbl_resource tr WHERE te.emp_id = tr.emp_id AND tr.emp_id = #{empId}) AND rownum<=10 ORDER BY tp.create_at DESC
